## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 28,000 units                             |

This will also help prevent stockouts in the near term and improve inventory turnover by decreasing the need for frequent smaller orders. |
